snippet.title: Dr. Plague | A Medieval Stealth Adventure - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dr. Plague is a stealth-adventure game that combines puzzle-solving, platforming, and ambient soundtracks.

Coming out on PC in April 8, 2025

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3508780/Dr_Plague/


#indie #stealthgameplay #adventuregame
